trans-unit.source: The instance context that has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 完成处理的实例上下文。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that is called when an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 表示当 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> 对象已完成处理时调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> 来通知 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 运行时 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> 对象已完成处理。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> once again.
trans-unit.target: 当 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> 对象通知运行时 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> 已完成任务时，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 会再次调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: 此循环将一直继续，直到 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 返回 `true`，然后上下文被关闭并回收。
